sentences.sContent: On the seventh day of Christmas.
Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.sCn: 圣灰星期三，大斋首日：复活节前第七个星期三和大斋期的第一天，在这一天很多基督教都用灰在前额画一标记以作忏悔和必死的标志。

sentences.sContent: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.sCn: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

words.tran: 第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的
第七十的；七十分之一的

trans.tranOther: one of seven equal parts of something
one of seven equal parts of something
